channel.title: [HELP] Cant get server on for others!
channel.description:
Ok I used no-ip and made a host called "intensescape.no-ip.org". Then I sorta got confused on my router things.. I can logon to the server using 0.0.0.0 but not intensescape.no-ip.org.
My router type is: D-Link DI-624
Can someone tell me how to make the settings, and maybe the firewall options also?
Thanks in advance (I Hope!)

item.title: [HELP] Cant get server on for others!
item.dc:creator: @Courtney Courtney
item.description:
@Courtney wrote:

Yes i have no-ip downloaded, and the little yellow dude is smiling lol, and it has “intensescape.no-ip.org” i clicked compile, it had the “press r” option so I use that. But If i wanna type in the server name to log on, it says offline. I think i did something wrong with the router, or firewall settings, Im not smart with this stuff =p.

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] Cant get server on for others!

item.title: [HELP] Cant get server on for others!
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

you need to provide more info like:
have you downloaded no-ip
if you have downloaded it have you got it set up and running.

you dont need to enter an ip for your own server any ways just run your runserver.bat and log on it should work

Read full topic
